comment: Hey, that's not true. I can spell.
besides, that's also not true. I played the saxophone for several years and have a very high wpm typing.
My issue is my phone like “this is totally the word you meant instead” or even better “that looks fine”
It comes out like, “accordion to studies, few people notice when you replace certain words with instruments”
Hey, it could be worse.. you phone could have a screwed up word suggestion and finish your sentences with the wrong strawberry.
Sometimes I imagine a little creature in my phone that looks like this :ptv-SteelwormHades:
What is that emoji anyhow? An ice cream sundae with a body?
I can never figure it out
Also typing in pure predictive text can be real fun
especially if you do it to people without warning
Don’t even get me started on auto fill
